channel.title: How can I add a Pk Point System
channel.description: Hey guys well i found another error on my server... I need a pk point system when i go to the char file i see after i kill some one I got zero pk points and i didnt even get a message that i killed him and i didnt get loot(edit)... So if you could leave a comment on how to add one or post a tut link that would be great. :)

item.title: How can I add a Pk Point System
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

public int PkPoints = 0,
if (put your player kills player method here) // If ‘pk method’ = true;
{
variable += #; // Add 1 to the variable. }

thats just a basis with a anti leech btw

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add a Pk Point System
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

public int variable = 0; // Declaration.

if (condition) // If 'condition' occurs.. { variable += 1; // Add 1 to the variable. }

You also have to write it to the character files, etc.
